title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single CLI or REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, push, list, delete models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models inside any LangChain pipeline.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style); manage models, chat history, multi-user, markdown, code highlighting.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder API, streaming, async, Android-compatible.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with fzf model picker, conversation history, and shell completions.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub-Copilot-like pair programmer.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for generative QA, summarization, or chat pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET community SDK for Ollama; strongly-typed requests/responses, streaming, dependency-injection ready.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri-based desktop GUI for Ollama; cross-platform, <5 MB installer, no browser needed.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets users chat with any local Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support, PVC, and autoscaling options.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service so pipelines can run local LLM tests without cloud keys.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama; idiomatic client with concurrent requests, streaming, and ActiveModel-style DSL.

title: ollama-swift
summary: Swift Package Manager client for Ollama; async/await, Combine publishers, and macOS/iOS examples.

title: ollama-spring-starter
summary: Spring Boot starter that auto-configures Ollama REST client beans and YAML-based model definitions.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for Ollama; same API as ollama-js repo, 40k+ weekly downloads.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: Official PyPI package for Ollama; 100k+ monthly downloads, supports Python ≥3.8.
